channel.title: No content servers avaialable
channel.description:
Black mesa used to work fine, then a while ago it stopped working. Steam displays a message
No Steam content servers are currently configured to deliver content for this game
I've tried reinstalling but it didn't help.

item.title: No content servers avaialable
item.dc:creator: Yammerhant
item.description:
I’m sorry to resurrect an old thread, but I went to give Black Mesa a go today and received the same error. I tried the “fix” suggested by Steam Help (change your Download Region) but like everything from Steam Help this was completely useless.

Read full topic

item.title: No content servers avaialable
item.dc:creator: JohnDamien
item.description:
I have the same Problem since friday, i cant get the game to start. Everytime i try to open the game i get this error message. Does anyone know how to fix this?

Read full topic

item.title: No content servers avaialable

item.description:
This is a sign… I really fear the day when Steam will be shut down forever.
